ygData.subject: Re: a bug question
ygData.msgSnippet: i was told that it doesn t matter what char you re on as, as long as your account is logged in, that s considered logged in time.....
ygData.messageBody:
i was told that it doesn't matter what char you're on as, as long as your
account is logged in, that's considered logged in time.....

Mr. J Daniels wrote:

> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> I have heard 24 hours logged time, 7 days not logged whichever comes
> first. What I would do is log in under another character and petition
> the gms explaining the situation and that you are using a differenct
> character name to petition because you dont want your corpse to decay.
>
> Mr. J Daniels
>
> On Wed, 30 Jun 1999, Mystik wrote:
>
> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> > ok....upon my most recent excursion, i ventured away from the
> > lizard-filled ruins of cazic thule, and set out for the undead dungeon
> > lower guk....well, when i got there, <mind you i had not been there but
> > once before> i was following some group members, and went into a room
> > with vampire bats..<they're not undead btw> and was promptly
> > attacked.....the group was helping me, but things took a turn for the
> > worse and we had to run for the zone....i unfortunately was killed
> > swimming in the water back to the zone. well, when i went to go find my
> > corpse, it wasn't there, and doing the /corpse command revealed nothing
> > except for "it can't be summoned from here" well, i guess it got stuck
> > in hte wall or something, so i peititioned them to move it so i could
> > loot it..haven't got a response to it yet, but am gonna keep
> > trying.....what my question is <i know you're saying about time!!> is
> > this...does anyone know how long of logged in time will a lv 37 <this is
> > freakin why i didn't get to make 38 :P> will stay around? i need them to
> > move it before time's up, and i was wondeirng how long it would remain
> > there.....i think so far i've been logged on about 7 and a half hours
> > since it happened...i've heard it'll be there for 24 hours of logged in
> > time...is this right?
> >
> > (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> > lv 37 human cleric of The Rathe
> >
> > ps thanx for putting up with my ramblings (:
> >
> >
